#text=I had decided that I wanted to visit my friend Paul whom lives quite a distance away .
#text=With this and my fear of air travel in mind I decided to take a train .
#text=After researching and finding one online I was well on my way to going to see my friend Paul .
#text=I drive to the station and decide that I am going to purchase a round trip ticket as this would be cheaper than just buying both tickets separately .
#text=I purchase my ticket and then go to sit down and wait for my train .
#text=Whenever my train arrives I have to get in line as they process our tickets .
#text=After all this is done I decide to take a seat by the window .
#text=I sit and fall asleep a bit as I ride on the train for hours .
#text=After a couple hours we finally reach the destination and I get off the train , excited to see my friend .
